```{r setup, include=FALSE}


library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(xlsx)
library (ggpubr)

setwd('C:/Users/fwestcott/OneDrive - Nexus365/Desktop/Results/OPLA-LF-vs-HF/qPCR')

All_Data <- read_excel("qPCR Summary.xlsx", sheet = 3)

All_Data$"FA" <- as.factor(All_Data$"FA")
```


```{r}

All_Data$FA <- factor(All_Data$FA, levels=c("0","200", "800"))

for (i in 3:ncol(All_Data)) {
   formula <- as.formula(paste(colnames(All_Data)[i], " ~ FA*Round", sep=""))
   model <- aov(formula, data = All_Data)

   cat("\n-----\n\n")
   cat(colnames(All_Data)[i])
   cat("\n")
   print(summary(model))
}

```
